attributes.action: not allow such honours as knighthoods, OBEs and MBEs to just be given away.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too easily do people recieve an OBE or MBE for such things as hosting a gameshow or playing football for 10 years. Once, a knighthood actually meant something and if plans go ahead to knight David Beckham then the system has been made a mockery of. I urge this to no longer continue.
